title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with a single CLI or REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, push and manage models with async support.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same generate/chat/embed API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama LLMs & embeddings with standard LangChain interface.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (renamed to Open WebUI); supports RAG, multimodal, admin controls.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama with Kotlin extensions; offers sync/async APIs, streaming, and model management.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for chatting and generating text with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama’s REST API with conversation history and REPL.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-style code-completion service for VS Code.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset letting you use Ollama models as generators & embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: function-calling, JSON mode, RAG, fine-tune, Docker, Kubernetes, and edge deployments.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix derivation for reproducible Ollama builds on NixOS with CUDA & ROCm variants.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a containerized service for CI pipelines and local dev.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB + Streamlit frontend.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any server with slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin that lets you query and summarize notes using local Ollama models without leaving your graph.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian community plugin for AI-assisted writing, summarization and Q&A powered by Ollama.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Lightweight Slack bot server that exposes Ollama models via Slack slash commands and app mentions.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: VS Code extension that adds Ollama-powered code generation, explanation and refactoring commands.
